attributes.action: the introduction of an automatic driving ban for anyone using a mobile phone whilst driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have observed on many occassions people using mobie phones whilst driving.
Such people do not regard the current 
penalty of a £60 fine as a deterrent.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
